channel.title: Bash on Huilin Li
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Huilin Li

item.title: Bash Scripts
item.description: Bash Scripts # How to discard changes in VScode? # Navigate to reporsitory (has .github folder) with changes. Then, git restore <file> Activate conda environment in bash script # source ~/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh conda activate ENV SBATCH Array jobs # #SBATCH -J array-job #SBATCH -a 1-3 #SBATCH -o array-job.%A.%a.log id_list="./id_list.txt" id=`head -n $SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_ID $id_list | tail -n 1` python3 script.py -in $id srun gpu # srun -N 1 --ntasks-per-node 2 -p v100 -q gpu --gres=gpu:1 --mem=50G --pty /bin/bash run scripts # sbatch test.
